subject: Parenting
title: The Permissive Parent
description: A fast breakdown of The Permissive Parent for builders.

hook.text: A child eats ice cream for dinner. The parent shrugs: 'She'll grow out of it.'

buildup.text: Permissive parents are warm and accepting but set few rules or boundaries.

discovery.text: They act more like a friend than an authority figure, avoiding confrontation.

twist.text: Kids love it short-term. Long-term, they struggle with self-regulation and impulse control.
